name: Trash Man (Thxrst)
description:
Trash Man is the result of a BlackThornProd game dev course that I recently completed. While the mechanics are fairly set-in-stone throughout the course, the art and music, as well as balance choices are greatly varied. I hope you enjoy my first attempt at making a game.

Controls:
          -Left and Right Arrow keys or 'A' and 'D' to move left and right.
          -Cursor to navigate menu and end screen.
          -Spacebar to dash

I do hope to use this game as a reference when making new games, and also as a experimental workspace when I want to try new ideas. So expect updates!  I think the first project I'll tackle is adding a score counter in the top right of the screen, or perhaps a timer.  Until then, thanks for reading about my game.

Music:
